sentences: Mees ise on mats, sõidab sõnnikuvankriga, aga hobune ees sajarublane.
Ta on headus, tarkus, visadus ise.
context: The word 'toovad' is the third-person plural present indicative form of the Estonian verb 'tooma', which means to bring, fetch or take. It appears in dictionary definitions showing examples where it emphasizes or highlights something as being central or essential among others.
